participant_1.name: Emma Johnson
participant_1.personality: Emma is energetic and passionate about her hobbies, especially dog agility. She has a serious side due to her chemistry background but loves to unwind through dancing.
participant_1.background: i compete in dog agility classes. i hate the color orange. i went to school for chemistry but work in a bookstore. i do not care about fashion. i dance on the weekends.

participant_2.name: Liam Smith
participant_2.personality: Liam is cheerful and imaginative, always excited for new adventures. He has a playful spirit and loves every moment spent with friends.
participant_2.background: i am in the third grade. mickey mouse is my favorite character. i play with my friends on the playground. i love to go to disney world every year.
